sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他不仅会说中文，还会说日语。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bùjǐn huì shuō Zhōngwén, hái huì shuō Rìyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle non seulement chinois, mais aussi japonais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He not only speaks Chinese, but also Japanese.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng bǔchōng yīdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais ajouter quelque chose.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I would like to add something.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 长城是中国的著名景点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chángchéng shì Zhōngguó de zhùmíng jǐngdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Grande Muraille est une attraction célèbre en Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Great Wall is a famous attraction in China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zài zhèngshì chǎnghé yào chuān zhèngzhuāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut porter une tenue formelle dans les occasions officielles.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should wear formal attire on formal occasions.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bìxū cǎiqǔ xíngdòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons agir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must take action.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家公司是去年成立的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī shì qùnián chénglì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise a été fondée l'année dernière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This company was founded last year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běijīng shì yī gè dà chéngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pékin est une grande ville.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing is a big city.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì chíxù le sān gè xiǎoshí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion a duré trois heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting lasted three hours.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shēnghuó chōngmǎn le xīwàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa vie est pleine d'espoir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His life is full of hope.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一部超级好看的电影。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī bù chāojí hǎokàn de diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un super bon film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a super good movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn chènshān hěn shìhé nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chemise te va très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This shirt suits you very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì chūjí Hànyǔ kèchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un cours de chinois débutant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a beginner Chinese course.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cóngqián yǒu yī gè guówáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il était une fois un roi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Once upon a time, there was a king.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài chūzhōng dúshū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est au collège.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is in middle school.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège cūn hěn ānjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce village est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This village is very quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ cónglái méi qùguò Rìběn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne suis jamais allé au Japon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have never been to Japan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā cóngshì jiàoyù gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille dans l'éducation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is engaged in education work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè gǔlǎo de chuánshuō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une légende ancienne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is an ancient legend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 艺术家创造了这件作品。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yìshùjiā chuàngzào le zhè jiàn zuòpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'artiste a créé cette oeuvre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The artist created this work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiǎoxīn yòng dāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez utiliser le couteau avec précaution.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please use the knife carefully.
